name: 專題討論（三）
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)、輔系修習  ◎限碩二修習 ◎課程不開放上修
goals: The objectives of this course are to provide graduate students with the knowledge and understanding of recent development and research trends in the field of earth sciences.
syllabus:
Goal:  
To provide graduate students with the knowledge and understanding about recent development and research trends in the field of atmospheric, oceanic, and earth sciences.  
  
Syllabus:

(1) Listening to the research reports by invited seminar speakers provides the opportunities for student to learn the newest research progresses in different fields of Earth Sciences and the reseach tools needed for their studies.

(2) Graduating students present their thesis research progress during the seminar time.
prerequisite: ◎Exclusive for students within this department(including dual degree program) ◎Exclusive for students taking minor within this department   ◎Exclusive for second year of graduate school ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
